title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2235/89 of 25 July 1989 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3611/84 fixing the conversion factors for frozen squid
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2235/89
of 25 July 1989
amending Regulation (EEC) No 3611/84 fixing the conversion factors for frozen squid
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3611/84, part I (a) is hereby replaced by the following:
1.2.3.4 //  //  //  //  // Species  // CN code  // Presentation  // Conversion factors   //    //   //   //  // '(a) Squid Loligo spp:   //   //   //   // - Loligo patagonica   // ex 0307 49 39   // - Whole, not cleaned  // 1,00   //   //   // - Cleaned   // 1,20   // - Loligo vulgaris   // 0307 49 31   // - Whole, not cleaned   // 2,00  //   //   // - Cleaned   // 2,40   // - Loligo pealei  // 0307 49 33   // - Whole, not cleaned   // 1,20   //   //  // - Cleaned   // 1,40   // - Loligo opalescens   // ex 0307 49 39   // - Whole, not cleaned   // 0,80   //   //   // - Cleaned   // 0,95   // - Other species of the genus Loligo  // ex 0307 49 39   // - Whole, not cleaned   // 1,10   //  //   // - Cleaned   // 1,30'   //    //   //   //

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 August 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 July 1989.
For the Commission
Manuel MARĂN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1981, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 148, 1. 6. 1989, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 333, 21. 12. 1984, p. 41.
(4) OJ No L 370, 31. 12. 1988, p. 37.
